titles.title: Honoring the life and achievements of John Archibald Wheeler and expressing condolences on his passing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science and Technology.
Mr. Baird moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1118.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
4/22/2008--Passed House without amendment. Honors the life and accomplishments of Professor John Archibald Wheeler, and expresses condolences on his passing.
Recognizes the profound importance of Dr. Wheeler's record as a pioneer in nuclear and theoretical physics and a long-time contributor to advancing mankind's understanding of the nature and workings of the universe.
